definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Why is oil visible in sunglint?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼可以在日光返輝中看到油污？

sentences.english: It took us hours to clean the greasy kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 咱們花了多少個小時盪滌到處是油污的廚房。

sentences.english: It’s not straightforward to compare oil spilled on an open sea with garbage picked up on beaches.
sentences.chinese: 要比較外海的油污與在海灘上搜集到的垃圾並非易事。

sentences.english: You may use hot water to rinse the congealed fat off the dinner plates.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用熱水把菜盤上凝結的油污沖洗掉。

sentences.english: The oil slicks are the ocean is spreading.
sentences.chinese: 浮在海面上的油污正往外擴散。

sentences.english: Any stubborn oil pollution, just a spray Yima, immediately return bright and clean as new.
sentences.chinese: 任何頑固油污，只需一噴一抹，立即回覆光潔如新。

sentences.english: Very thick oil may be visible outside of the sunglint region.
sentences.chinese: 非常厚的油污即使是在日光返輝區之外也能被觀測到。

sentences.english: For grease marks try a proprietary dry cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 若要去除油污，可以試試一種專利乾洗劑。

sentences.english: Under an ultraviolet spotlight, the same tar patties glow yellow against the sand, which appears purple.
sentences.chinese: 紫外線照射下，沙子呈紫色，油污塊則呈亮黃色。

sentences.english: Booker T. put on his grimed and grease coat.
sentences.chinese: 特穿上了他那件骯髒油污的上衣。

sentences.english: Another is chemistry purgation agent, can fuse the oil contamination of sediment in order to wipe in addition to.
sentences.chinese: 另一種是化學清洗劑，可溶解沉積的油污以便擦除。

sentences.english: Of course most of those jobs would be cleaning oil off ducks.
sentences.chinese: 當然，其中大多數工作將會是清除鴨子身上的油污。

sentences.english: His clothes are begrimed with oil and dirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的衣服被油污弄髒了。

sentences.english: The soap has a defatting effect.
The thin phone book was grimy from being thumbed by filling station hands.
sentences.chinese: 薄薄的電話薄讓油污的手指翻得黑不溜秋。

sentences.english: That's her on the beach wiping oil off the sea-birds' feathers.
sentences.chinese: 她會在沙灘上爲海鳥們抹走羽毛上的油污。

definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
